name: Shift Register Random
description: Generates random CVs using the rotating shift register method ("Turing Machine"). Creates a looping sequence of CVs with controllable likelihood of change. Can lock the loop. Outputs CVs and/or triggers.

parameters.name: Unrandomness
parameters.description: Likelihood of pattern not changing. 0% = 50/50 chance of bit flip (most random). 100% = never flips (locked). -100% = always flips (locks pattern with 2x length).

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Sets whether the pattern moves forwards or in reverse when clocked.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: Sets the length of the shift register (number of steps in the sequence).

parameters.name: Cause
parameters.description: Chooses what will cause a trigger to be generated.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Chooses trigger output type: fixed length or percentage of clock length.

parameters.name: Length (ms)
parameters.description: The trigger length, if fixed length is chosen.

parameters.name: Length (%)
parameters.description: The trigger length, if percentage of clock is chosen.

parameters.name: Modify input
parameters.description: Chooses the "modify" input bus. High gate forces pattern modification, even if locked.

parameters.name: CV output
parameters.description: The output bus for the CV.

parameters.name: Trigger output
parameters.description: The output bus for the trigger.

parameters.name: CV output mode
parameters.description: The Add/Replace mode for the CV bus.

parameters.name: Trigger output mode
parameters.description: The Add/Replace mode for the trigger bus.
